title: New Years Wot
author: verias
text:
So, my New Year ring in was somewhat subdued. Sudden loss of heat, which was frustrating, and very cold. Granted, it's much better now, but hey, at least we're still kicking!

So, now you get a glimpse of this gown on Chrys' body. How do you guys think Theresa is going to react to seeing it?
